{{Wired embedded system |brand=SMC |model=D3CM1604 |revision=(1.0) |asin=B00LI1F32U |is_manuf=No |type=cable modem |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM33843D |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L3206EM2I-12G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ1G63EFR-PBC |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J303 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Cable Modem LNA;Broadcom;BCM3413;3413, KMLG10, TD1434, 4106149A;1; |flags=DOCSIS 3.0 |stock_boot=Broadcom Aeolus |stock_os=eCos |default_ip=192.168.100.1 |default_user=MSO |default_pass=changeme }}
D3CM1604V model includes eMTA voice.
DOCSIS 3.0 16x4<!--
-->{{CableModemSpec |down_c=16 |up_c=4 }}
